name: Welcome Home
description:
Created for the Black Thorn Prod Game jam #3

You are a lonely colonizer/terraformer that has crash-landed!  Can you survive in this inhospitable land and succeed in your mission to spawn plant life?

  • Space - jump
  • WASD - move
  • Left Click - Interact (water plants, collect water)

Tried to fit the theme "Less is more" by  collecting and using water to keep yourself and your plants hydrated.  Less water is more life for yourself and the plants. The plants also produce water which would apply as less water is infinite water (theoretically). 

External Assets used:

  • Piano music - https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/325108/
  • Wind sound - https://freesound.org/people/Karas_Homemade_SFX/sounds/350578/
  • Ground Texture - (Seamless Beach Sand Texture) - https://www.creativeswall.com/30-free-sand-textures/
  • Ground Normal Map -  https://www.deviantart.com/mushin3d/art/Sand-texture-seamless-743480857
  • Character Controller - Brackys youtube vid
